content.rendered:
SEO means Search Engine Optimization training is more demand in the era of Digital Marketing. Many companies are looking for SEO specialist to promote their website. SEO process doesn’t require any technical knowledge so any one can join for this course. Vmaxinfo Instituteprovide SEO training in puneand helps candidates to develop their career in SEO in Digital Marketing industries.

SEO Course Topics

  • SEO basics
  • How SEO works
  • Websites and Blogs
  • Crawlers and Spiders
  • Keyword Research Analysis
  • On Page Optimization
  • Meta Tag
  • Sitemap
  • SEO analysis
  • Off Page Optimization
  • Page Rank
  • Google Panda and Penguin
  • SEO Tools
